cause.description:
"Saving one dog may not change the world, but the world has surely changed for that one dog" - author unknown-
One of the most important things we can give our Pets is "Time". The time to love them, care for them, and train them. Animal Rescues and Humane Societies across the country are filled with Pets whose families didn't have "Time". Every year, the "Time is up" for 12 million companion Pets.
Do you have the "Time" to make a difference?
To donate locally go to:
WINDSOR HUMANE: http://www.canadahelps.org/CharityProfilePage.aspx?CharityID=s18000
JAZZPURR: http://www.canadahelps.org/CharityProfilePage.aspx?CharityID=s65349
**waiting for the canadian (canadahelps.org) donation version to be added**
1. Promote better legislation for the humane treatment of animals.
2. Achieve widespread improvement in people's attitudes and sense of responsibility towards animals.
3. Reduce overbreeding by implementing spay/neuter programmes and better educating the public.
